Description: Creates a Project Access Token in GitLab
Schema: {"typeName":"GitLab::Projects::AccessToken","description":"Creates a Project Access Token in GitLab","sourceUrl":"https://github.com/aws-ia/cloudformation-gitlab-resource-providers.git","documentationUrl":"https://github.com/aws-ia/cloudformation-gitlab-resource-providers","definitions":{"GitLabAccess":{"type":"object","properties":{"Url":{"description":"URL of the GitLab Server","type":"string"},"AccessToken":{"description":"Access Token","type":"string"}},"required":["AccessToken"],"additionalProperties":false}},"properties":{"Name":{"description":"The name of the Project Access Token to create.","type":"string","maxLength":64},"ProjectId":{"description":"The ID (numeric) of the project for which this Access Token is created.
